interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MEIQIER Eye Massager with Natural Quartz Jade, Facial Massage Tool with Heat & Vibration for Eliminate Eye Bags, Dark Circle Remover Eye Lip Fine Lines, Promote Essence Absorption
Review Date: 2022/11/03
Store: MEIQIER
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MEIQIER', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'}
Review Text: I use this every day. While I'm brushing my teeth and getting ready for my day. It cane with no instructions but its fairly easy to figure out. Too, just come back to the product description online and read how to use it. Charged pretty quick and lasts about 4 days on one charge.  The laugh lines and frown lines are slowly loosing their depth and overall, my skin tone has evened out quite a bit. I'm happy with it. Its quick, very convenient and does offer results with disciplined use. Try it!!
Review Title: After a month of use I can see a visible difference
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Nano Botanix | Recovery Night Gel Moisturizer - with Hyaluronic Acid, Dual Peptides, and Color Correction - plus Aloe, Licorice, and Green Tea Extracts - Recover and Repair - 1.7 OZ (50mL)
Nano Botanix
{'Brand': 'Nano Botanix', 'Unit Count': '1.70 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 1.5 x 1.42 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '850034727271'}
There's really no fragrance which is kind of a bummer BUT the gel is light weight, soaks in well and hydrates beautifully.  I love this product line and tried this as an alternative to the night serum. I love both.  This seems to absorb quicker into my skin. Leaves no greasy residue,  not sticky. Super soft. I highly recommend this and all of their products.  I'm 54 and am enjoying more glowing, youthful looking skin.
After 2 weeks I can see a nice decrease in fine lines
GOMAY Hydrating Amino Acid Foaming Facial Cleanser, Daily Face Wash for Makeup Remover with Face Cleansing Brush
GO MAY
{'Brand': 'GO MAY', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Oil-free,Soap-free', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Fl Oz', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 6 inches; 8.96 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GM-FC03', 'UPC': '633183294814'}
Great on sensitive skin. I love the scrubber. Soft silicone like fingers that massage your skin as you wash. All in one,  I love it.  Easy to dispense and fits well in hand. Cap to keep it sterile.  Great product. Great value for the money. Not harsh but deep cleaning.
Easy to use, no fragrance,  deep clean
VOFEL Jelly Masks for Facials Mask Powder for Moisturizing Anti Aging Jelly Face Mask Peel Off 9 Pcs
VOFEL
{'Brand': 'VOFEL', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Vanilla,Lemon', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 3.46 x 1.46 inches; 5.86 Ounces', 'UPC': '770456407264'}
Dries to powder, like clay. Re-wet it then after a minute, it loosened up and could be torn off. Didnt hydrate, just dried out my skin. Didn't notice any lightening of my skin.
Dries hard. Re-wet then tears off. Faux fragrances
Vitamasques Cica Green Tea Jelly Facial Cleanser Gentle pH Cleanser is Refreshing, Cleansing & Exfoliating for Smooth, Clean & Radiant Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Vitamasques
{'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.81 x 1.38 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258969917'}
While yes, it deep cleaned my skin it also dried it out terribly.  Great lather but I couldn't wash it off fast enough. I nearly vomited. Its truely awful. Wet dog and day old beach seaweed aroma. I won't use anymore of this product and I had to use another cleanser just to remove the smell.
Fragrance please. This smells like wet dog
Organic Patchouli Beard Wash by American Shaving Co, Rich, Foaming Cleanser that Softens, cleanse & Strengthens the beard hair, Clean and Refresh your beard with Patchouli Fragrance - 8 oz
American Shaving Co.
{'Brand': 'American Shaving Co.', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '7.84 x 1.85 x 1.81 inches; 8.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '685167904479'}
The fragrance is not over powering,  just enough. It deeply cleaned my hair of buildup from styling products. Literally squeaky clean. This is not a shampoo for daily use but its fantastic for WOMEN with dull, lifeless hair to remove buildup. I love it. I will happily buy this again. (Shake well before use)
Light fragrance, deep cleansing
Olive And Avocado Hair Mask For Hair Growth And Dry Damaged Hair By BACC Beauty And Care - Treatment With Natural Extracts | Deep Moisturizer | Hydrates | Repairs And Soften | Hair Mask For Dry Damaged Hair For Women And Men - 18.5 Fl Oz 550ml
BACC Beauty and Care
{'Brand': 'BACC Beauty and Care', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Benefits': 'Damage Control', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Conditioner,Conditioning,Hair Growth,Hydrating,Nourishing', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 4 x 3.5 inches', 'Item model number': 'BACC-MSCRLLACAPILAROLVAGUCTE', 'UPC': '697521784740'}
I needed a mask for my very long, dry hair. Avocado is so good for your hair and I'm overall, pretty happy with this product. I left it in longer than suggested bc my hair is so dry. When I rinsed it out and towel dried my hair, I could see the curls coming back. The longer I use it, the more it nourishes my hair. I will absolutely get this again and again. Would be nice to have a yummy fragrance but I'm still loving my hair after using this.
Moderately hydrating after first use, easy to use
MRTREUP Neon Face Paint UV Glow Body Paint Water Activated Eyeliner , 6 Colors Cake Eyelier Fluorescent Hydra Graphic Pink Green Glow in the Dark Body Paint for Club Halloween Party Makeup Art Paint
MRTREUP
{'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Package Information': 'Palette', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Specialty': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 1.6 x 1.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
Could not be easier to use. Wet brush and start painting. Deeply pigmented,  long lasting.  I love these and will absolutely buy them again.
Fabulous colors, deeply pigmented FUN

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Age Group**: 54 years old
- **Skin Care Focus**: Continued emphasis on hydration, recovery, and repair, particularly for the eye area, as indicated by a new focus on tools that target fine lines and overall skin tone enhancement.
- **Preferred Product Characteristics**: Strong preference for lightweight, non-greasy formulations, with a cautious openness to subtle scents, such as natural ones, reflecting a willingness to explore innovative solutions despite previous negative experiences with fragrances.
- **Product Usage**: Actively uses night moisturizers and serums, along with an established routine that includes hair masks. Recently integrated facial massage tools, suggesting an interest in enhancing application techniques and improving skin health, while maintaining hydration. Also exploring vibrant and fun cosmetic products, indicating a playful approach to makeup.
- **Scent Preference**: Initially averse to fragrances, but has grown open to pleasant, natural scents that complement effective product performance, as evidenced by recent purchases.
- **Overall Satisfaction**: High satisfaction with product performance, increasingly discerning towards treatments that visibly enhance hydration and skin health. Feedback acknowledges noticeable improvements in skin texture and tone.
- **Brand Loyalty**: Loyal to brands known for hydration efficacy but remains open to experimenting with new and innovative products that promise tangible results.
- **Evaluation of Products**: Prioritizes ease of use and effectiveness, with recent interests extending into tools that contribute to a more refined skincare regimen, while maintaining a focus on quality and results.
